name: White Eyes (itch)
description:
Feuding clans are threatening to start an all-out war, but as the leader of a humble blind guild, you are poised to investigate and negotiate their conflict. Unshackled by sight, you have incredibly heightened senses that reveal secrets of the world around you. Nothing can be hidden from you as you leverage these secrets to restore peace in White Eyes.

This game was made using Unity for a project course at Dakota State University.
